replies.body:
Why? xD
1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?
9. Why do you always "Just kid"?

replies.body:
@golden

1. What's your favorite color and why? white, because, it is simple
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be? Dont know exactly what you mean by "benefiting myself"
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is? There is no meaning, we're just here, a product of evolution. Wow that was deep :P
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds) yeah, its 2.333?
5. Is your power level over 9000? yep
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why? um probably nuts because who eats that stuff :D
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie apocalypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why? kitchen knife, it is a useful weapon
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why? a cheetah, for its speed
9. Why do you always "Just kid"? lol this is my friend's account that I've been using this entire time, so I have no idea. Oh wait, his initials are JK...

@croc

What music do you listen to? whatever's on the radio
What do you like about rushing? seeing your amazing defenses and trying to breach them
Why a white skin instead of a black one? (not intended to be racist :T)  look at question 1 from golden
Any tips on rushing? yeah, watch my vids
What do you like most about Avicus? the community
Origin of username? my friend's initials (this is his account, i dont have one)
Favorite food? IN N OUT DOUBLE DOUBLE xD
Do you play other games besides Minecraft? League of legends and counter strike
doge? wut

@carrie

Why did you change your skin before from being robin? D: My friend only changed it to robin to piss me off
how old are you? (I forgot what's ur age) 15...
Where do you live? california
Where did you find avicus? i was searching for "skywars servers" and came across "skywars.co" which is another one of avicus's domain names

whew that took a long time
